Package icyllis.arc3d.shaderc.codegen

Class CodeGenerator

java.lang.Object
icyllis.arc3d.shaderc.codegen.CodeGenerator
public abstract class CodeGenerator extends Object
Abstract superclass of all code generators, which take a Program as input and produce code as output.
